articles.title: Congress of DPRK Red Cross Society Held
articles.content:
Congress of DPRK Red Cross Society Held
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- There took place the Congress of the DPRK Red Cross Society at the People's Palace of Culture on Oct. 18 and 19.
					 It reviewed the implementation of the 2012-2016 strategic development objectives and annual action plans since its 2012 Congress and discussed the issues arising in expanding and developing humanitarian activities of the Society.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, members of the Central Committee of the Society, RC officials in central and local areas, RC volunteers and young RC members.
					
					 Present there on invitation were representatives of the International Committee of the Red Cross, the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and RC Societies of Denmark, Finland and UK, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, members of a delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross and a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his congratulatory speech said that the RC Society has successfully carried out its mission and role under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Society will as ever make big progress in the noble humanitarian activities, hoping for successful congress.
					
					 Boris Michel, delegate of the International Committee of the Red Cross, and Christopher Staines, delegate of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, in their addresses expressed their will to further strengthen the international cooperation, saying that the DPRK Red Cross Society has carried out the work to realize the fundamental principle of the red cross and red crescent movement in a responsible way. 
					
					 The congress heard a report. 
					
					 The reporter said that in the period under review the Society has fully implemented the leadership role to make sure that RC officials and volunteers carried out their responsibility and duty in conformity with the changed circumstances and condition and the requirement of objects helped by the RC Society.
					
					 He underscored the need to defend and preserve and glorify the feats of the great leaders and develop the RC Society into humanitarian organization.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The congress reviewed the fulfillment of the budget of the society in the period under review and modified the rule.
					
					 It also discussed the strategic plan and budget till 2020 and elected members of the new guidance organ.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Red Cross Society Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Red Cross Society Marked
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 70th anniversary of the DPRK Red Cross Society.
					 Present there were Chairman Kang Ji Yong and members of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society, RC officials in central and local areas, RC volunteers and young RC members and working people in the city.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegates of the International Committee of the Red Cross, the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and RC Societies of Denmark, Finland and UK, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, members of a delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross and a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Ho Rim, secretary general of the C.C., of the Society, said in a speech that it has successfully carried out its mission and duty including mass  health service and hygiene and rescue work, wartime rescue and anti-epidemic activities, realization of repatriation of Koreans in Japan, humanitarian support to different countries of the world, activities to reduce misfortune and pain of compatriots caused by the division of the country, prevention of disaster, prior prevention, urgent counter-action at a time of disaster, rehabilitation and development and prevention of various kinds of disease.
					
					 He said that the Society will as ever preserve and glorify the immortal feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and make a tangible contribution to the nation-wide struggle to realize the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 Introduced at the meeting were officials, RC volunteers and young RC members who set an example in the RC work.
					
					 The participants looked round photos and books showing proud history and activities of the DPRK Red Cross Society and watched video "DPRK Red Cross Society 1946-2016".
					
					 There was an art performance given by the young RC members and Taedong Blind School for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the Society.
					
					 On the same day, the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society gave a reception.

articles.title: DPRK RCS Hits Strategic Targets for 2016
articles.content:
DPRK RCS Hits Strategic Targets for 2016
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Red Cross Society (RCS) has hit the targets for its strategic plan up to 2016.
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Ri Chung Bok, chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK RCS.
					
					 Recalling that the Congress of the DPRK RCS in 2012 adopted its strategic plan to be carried out by 2016 under the changing situation and the 2020 Strategy of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRC), Ri said:
					
					 To attain its prospective goals, the RCS paid special attention to preventing disasters and raising its capability for emergencies.
					
					 It has improved the country's ecological environment and environmental sanitation through a vigorous drive to disseminate the knowledge about first-aid treatment and conduct the hygienic information service and education aimed at preventing various diseases and coping with unexpected outbreak of diseases.
					
					 The Society also established sewerage networks for several thousands of dwelling houses to reduce the incidence rate of diseases by water in residential areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, many achievements were made in improving the living conditions for children and women, solitary old persons and disabled persons and strengthening the activities of young RC volunteers.
					
					 And the Society has stimulated the public interest in the RC activities through close cooperation with mass media and social organizations.
					
					 Its exchange and cooperation with IFRC, the International Committee of the Red Cross and others have been further strengthened, Ri said.

articles.title: Meeting of Fourth Committee of 71st UN General Assembly Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Fourth Committee of 71st UN General Assembly Held
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the Fourth Committee (special politics and non-colonization) of the 71st UN General Assembly was held at the UN Headquarters on Oct. 11 and 13.
					 There was a discussion on agenda item "International Cooperation in Peaceful Use of Space".
					
					 The DPRK delegate said that the DPRK's peaceful and legitimate satellite launch represents the exercise of legitimate independent right of a sovereign state recognized 100 % under the UN Charter and the Outer Space Treaty.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK would in the future, too, further step up the space development for peaceful purposes and strengthen international cooperation and exchanges in the study of space science and in the field of satellite launch.
					
					 As the speech of the DPRK delegate was over, only the south Korean puppet delegate challenged it, reeling out such rhetoric that the DPRK's satellite launch was "ballistic rocket launch for mounting nuclear warhead", "it was a violation of the 'resolution' of the UN Security Council" and that "south Korea appealed a halt to having technical cooperation with north Korea".
					
					 The DPRK delegate, exercising the right to refute the claim, strongly denounced the UN Security Council's "resolution" as a wanton violation of the legitimate right of a sovereign state specified in the UN Charter and international law, and a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 He disclosed the illegal nature of the moves of the U.S. and its followers to violate the legitimate independent right of a sovereign state, and once again clarified the strong stand of the DPRK to further demonstrate its dignity and might as a space power no matter what others may say. 
					
					 At the meeting delegates of Iran, Ecuador and other developing countries asserted that the right to peaceful use of space and to develop it should be respected as it is an inalienable right belonging to all countries.
					
					 They called for boosting international cooperation, saying that the purpose of the peaceful use of space is to bring benefits to all countries through space development.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Speaks at Meeting of Third Committee of 71st UN General Assembly
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Speaks at Meeting of Third Committee of 71st UN General Assembly
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A delegate of the DPRK addressed the meeting of the Third Committee of the 71st General Assembly of the United Nations on Oct. 11 when there was a discussion on agenda item "Progress of Women".
					  Saying that women holds an important position and play a huge role in promoting progress and harmony of society and welfare of families, the delegate continued:
					
					 The government of the DPRK has taken legal and practical measures one after another to make sure that women fully exercise their rights in all fields of society with equal rights with men.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, women in our country take an active part in state and social activities and make a great contribution to the development of society.
					
					 Since it acceded to the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women 15 years ago, the DPRK government has sincerely fulfilled the obligation specified in the convention and closely cooperated with international organizations in the field of promotion of rights of women and the protection of their health.
					
					 The DPRK government will strive hard for the progress of women and promotion of their welfare, and further strengthen international cooperation and exchanges.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we appeal to the international community to pay due attention to Japan's moves to cover up the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The crimes are hideous ones against humanity as Japan violated the rights of a large number of women in Asia and several countries and regions of the world after reducing them to the sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army including Korean women numbering 200 000.
					
					 But Japan is still trying to cover up in a crafty manner the crimes, while denying it, far from making an apology for them. 
					
					 Japan insulted the victims of the sexual slavery as "victims of flesh trafficking" and categorically stood against the registration of the issue of the sexual slavery as a heritage in UNESCO records.
					
					 Last year in return for paying a few pennies of fund, Japan cooked up a sort of "agreement" to keep the past crimes buried into oblivion and buckled down to implementing it and is demanding the removal of the statue of a girl sexual slave outside the Japanese embassy in south Korea.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to the crimes against humanity.
					
					 Japan can never evade the responsibility for the sexual slavery and is under obligation to make state and legal acknowledgement of its past crimes and make apology and reparation as demanded by the international community.
					
					 Recently the UN is taking issue with the sexual violence committed by UN peace-keeping forces deployed in several regions of the world.
					
					 Therefore, the UN should never connive at Japan's moves to embellish and cover up its past act of inflicting the sexual slavery upon hundreds of thousands of women, while still refusing to make official apology and reparation for the crimes.
					
					 We hold that the UN has to take to task the south Korean authorities' hideous terrorist act of abducting a group of women citizens of the DPRK in broad daylight but turning down the elementary humanitarian demand for opening their state to public and sending them back to their home.
					
					 How to handle these questions serves as a touchstone discerning the true mission of "promoting human rights" professed by the UN and international human rights organizations.
					
					 Therefore, we strongly demand that measures be taken to officially deal with the crimes against humanity committed by the south Korean authorities and send them back to the folds of their families as early as possible.

articles.title: National Reconciliation Council Issues Open Questionnaire to Traitor Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
National Reconciliation Council Issues Open Questionnaire to Traitor Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The National Reconciliation Council issued an open questionnaire to traitor Park Geun Hye on Wednesday as regards her recent confrontation hysteria that reached its height.
					 She has gone so far as to incite "defection from the north," daring talk about "sign of its collapse" and "self-ruin," not content with crying out for a "preemptive strike" at the DPRK, pursuant to her master U.S. hostile policy toward it, the questionnaire noted. 
					
					 Ridiculing her hysteric confrontation racket as a desperate last-ditch bid to tide over the serious ruling crisis close to her final ruin, taken aback by the DPRK's rapid bolstering of its national power, the National Reconciliation Council questioned Park as follows:
					
					1. Now is the time for you to open to public the fact that "confidence-building process" and "gaining a great opportunity of unification" touted by you was chicanery to realize the wild dream for "unification through absorption" at the U.S. beck and call, isn't it?
					
					 Will you persist in shameless acts to conceal the fact that what you touted was a trite artifice to cover up your sinister design to realize the wild ambition for "unification through absorption" now that your confrontational intention has been fully revealed?
					
					2. You cry out for a "preemptive strike" with the backing of the U.S. Do you not care about Seoul including Chongwadae and all other parts of south Korea being reduced to a sea in flames and debris by a prompt and merciless counter-strikes of the DPRK?
					
					 Do you think you can remain indifferent to the above-said event and you can survive a nuclear war? 
					
					3. Don't you know that your open agitation of "defection from the north" is hideous allurement and abduction and a thrice-cursed crime against humanity diametrically running counter to international law and the UN Charter? 
					
					 Openly agitating "defection" among the people of a sovereign state is just a blatant challenge and wanton violation of the UN Charter and international law stipulating it as the fundamental principle to respect sovereignty of all countries and not interfere in their internal affairs and specifying abduction as crime against humanity. 
					
					 You often accuse others, talking about "observance of the UN Charter" and "international law", but make no scruple of committing inhuman crimes, ignorant of the above-said elementary principle, don't you?
					
					4. Can you own responsibility for groundlessly distorting the reality in the DPRK and decrying its sincere efforts for mending the north-south relations by running the whole gamut of lies, tricks and fabrications to incite hostility toward the compatriots in the north during your tenure of office?
					
					The ruler ill-famed for lies and fabrications is bound to meet a stern punishment of history after being forsaken by the people.
					
					Can you own responsibility before history and the nation for falsifying truth about the DPRK and desperately inciting bad blood toward the fellow countrymen in the north by floating wild rumors about them?
					
					5. Can you allow south Koreans to come here and see what is happening in the north for themselves when all ways to the north are kept open, not preventing them from seeing and hearing about the DPRK as you are desperately negating the eye-opening realities in the DPRK?
					
					You'd better come here and see if you want to help south Koreans dispel their doubts about "contingency", "instable social system" and "effective sanctions."
					
					 You may send all who want to come here and see if you are not in a position to personally come here for fear of punishment for your sins.
					
					6. Are you ready to acknowledge the thrice-cursed crimes you have committed by hurting the dignity and honor of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and face a stern judgment at a DPRK court?
					
					The supreme judicial organ of the DPRK branded you as a top-class criminal and sentenced you to capital punishment long ago according to the criminal code of the DPRK.
					
					As you unhesitatingly and desperately insulted the symbol of the dignity and glory of the DPRK, you should be "emboldened" to pay a dear price for it. Can you do so?

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on medical science was held at the Grand People's Study House on Oct. 18 and 19 to mark the fifth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Giving Full Play to the Advantages of the Socialist Public Health System by Bringing about a Revolutionary Turn in the Public Health Work".
					 Attending it were officials concerned, medical officials, scientists, teachers and researchers in the field of public health. 
					
					 It was divided into panels of hygienic and anti-epidemic, surgery, internal medicine, basic medicine, pharmacy and Koryo medicine. 
					
					 It heard many papers on medical science.
					
					 The speakers recalled that Kim Jong Il published the work on Oct. 7, Juche 100 (2011), comprehensively indicating the ways to bring about a great turn in public health.
					
					 In recent years, various healthcare centers have been successfully built to consolidate the material and technical foundation of the field of public health and fully demonstrate the advantages of the socialist healthcare system whereby the party and the state take care of the people's life and health in a responsible manner, they stressed. 
					
					 The symposium introduced successes and experience gained in the field of medical science and technology researches.

articles.title: Results of Recovery Efforts in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Recovery Efforts in Disaster Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The framework for houses has been completed in severely flood-hit Musan County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 Soldier-builders carried out the framework of dwelling houses far ahead of schedule by keeping the operation of building machines at full capacity, exploring inner reserves to the maximum and introducing advanced construction methods.

articles.title: Dressing Ground of Chonma Mine Commissioned
articles.content:
Dressing Ground of Chonma Mine Commissioned 
 Chonma, October 19 (KCNA) -- The dressing ground of the Chonma Mine in North Phyongan Province went operational.
					 The construction of the dressing ground provided a firm ground for increasing the mineral production 1.5 times while saving manpower and electricity as compared with that in the past.
					
					 A commissioning ceremony took place on the spot on Wednesday.

articles.title: Diverse Activities for Promotion of Children's Health in DPRK
articles.content:
Diverse Activities for Promotion of Children's Health in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Association for Supporting the Children has conducted diverse activities to improve the health and nutritive conditions of children.
					 They include the technological exchange and cooperation in treating infants with congenital heart disease caused by blood circulation disorder with social organizations of other countries.
					
					 The Association worked hard to ensure the regular information activity on such subjects as "On vaccination for children" and "Diseases to be prevented through vaccination" in cooperation with the GAVI.
					
					 It also made great efforts to boost the capacity of the Songyo Children's Clinic run by itself and perfect the process of producing nutrients for children established across the country. And rooms for information about children's health were set up in various parts of the country, including Tongdaewon District of Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Myong Chol, secretary of the Association, told KCNA that at present it gives a priority to conducting many-sided cooperation with international bodies and charitable organizations to improve the children's health and living conditions in the flood-hit northern part of the country.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Crimes Are Intolerable: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Crimes Are Intolerable: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Serpent-like Park Geun Hye, traitor  driven into a tight corner inside and outside, is making her last-ditch efforts, giving off poison.
					 Recently she blustered that the DPRK's nuclear weapons and missiles pose "potential threat that can push all Koreans to extinction, not just as a means for simple threatening and negotiations", adding that THAAD deployment is "the minimum defence system for protecting the lives of the people" even though it is denounced by the nation as the trouble-maker.
					
					 This can never be tolerated as it is a traitorous act of finding fault with the legitimate measure for bolstering nuclear weapons to defend the nation's sovereignty and security from the increasing U.S nuclear threats.
					
					 The Park group, faithful nuclear war servants of outsiders, are recklessly playing with fire in the hotspot where the nukes of the DPRK for justice and the nukes of the U.S. for pressure and sanctions are in the state of acute confrontation.
					
					 They are working hard to realize their scenario for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK in pursuance of the U.S. while talking about "three-phased tailored deterrence strategy" and "operational plan for massive punishment by triad strike system".
					
					 They allowed the ground deployment in south Korea of the U.S. nuclear strategic bombers for the first time in history at the instigation of the U.S. which called for "escalating military pressure on the north's leadership".
					
					 Recently the U.S. nuclear carrier flotilla led by nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan sailed to the three seas of Korea to conduct madcap joint exercises for mounting "precision strike" at the headquarters and the strategic strongholds of the DPRK.
					
					 After pushing the Korean peninsula to the brink of war beyond control through the racket for war exercises and reducing the whole of south Korea into a theatre of scramble for power and nuclear war exercises, Park is bringing the whirlwind of "extinction of all Koreans."
					
					 The south Korean people are strongly demanding the Park regime stop its act of bringing the nightmare of a nuclear war to the people, saying that "not only THAAD but thing more sophisticated than it will not be able to down the ballistic rockets of the north".
					
					 If we had not had access to nuclear weapons and had failed to steadily bolster them up, we would have fallen victim to the U.S. nuclear attack a hundred times.
					
					 Park Geun Hye will certainly have to pay a dear price for the thrice-cursed crimes she has committed by frantically kicking up the racket for escalating confrontation and exterminating the nation over the north's nuclear weapons for justice protecting its security.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Overthrowing Regime of Traitors in South Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Overthrowing Regime of Traitors in South Korea
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) and at least 100 trade unions under the KCTU and hundreds of thousands of workers launched large-scale general strikes in Seoul, Pusan, Inchon and other parts of south Korea in protest against traitor Park Geun Hye's evil labor policy including the forcible introduction of the "system of paying wages according to piece rate". Many south Koreans concerned of the cooperative relations between the north and the south entered the 100-day all-night sit-in demanding the puppet authorities roll back its policy of escalating the confrontation with the north with the anniversary of the October 4 declaration as a momentum.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article the massive anti-"government" struggle of the south Korean people of all social standings is an eruption of the pent-up grievance and resentment at the Park Geun Hye group of traitors as it has turned south Korea into a barren land of democracy, human rights and people's living.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The worst "era of people's misfortune" and "era of people's despair" is coming to south Korea due to the brutal tyranny of the Chongwadae witch.
					
					 Countless are those who commit suicides, unable to live and those emigrating to other countries after abandoning "nationality" in south Korea where all crimes and scandals are rampant and horrible disasters occur one after another.
					
					 Unable to live any longer under the unprecedented unpopular rule of  the group of traitors which has driven the people's living into destitution, the south Korean people are rising en masse in the anti-"government" struggle in the death-defying spirit.
					
					 The massive anti-"government" struggle of the south Korean people represents their protest against the confrontation maniacs bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the nation.
					
					 There can be neither slightest compromise nor concession to the group of traitors challenging the people's aspiration and desire.
					
					 The earlier such regime collapses, the better.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Assertion about "Solution to North's Nuclear Issue"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Assertion about "Solution to North's Nuclear Issue"
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea is spouting a litany of such invective as "foiling of scenario to use nuclear weapons through preemptive attack", "urgent THAAD deployment" and "sustainable tightening of high-profile sanctions and pressure" and advertising this as a "solution to the nuclear issue of the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The "nuclear issue of the north" is something which even the strategic think tank of the U.S. put on the shelf, after failing to seek a way out but Park Geun Hye, no more than its lackey, is going so impudent as to talk about its solution. This only provokes a side-splitting laughter. 
					
					"Preemptive attack on the north" Park touted as "solution to the nuclear issue of the north" is no more than reckless hysteria to be kicked up by an idiot on the deathbed. 
					
					 The preemptive attack on the DPRK, the world's nuclear power, is bound to lead to the final destruction of the U.S. and the puppet regime.
					
					 She would be well advised to behave herself, mindful that nothing is more foolish than attempting to dodge the DPRK's retaliatory nuclear strike with such ineffective means as THAAD. 
					
					 She is still counting on her racket for sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK though she has bitterly experienced they are no longer workable. She must be a halfwit, indeed.
					
					 If she tries to destroy through sanctions and pressure the bulwark of independence, invincible political and military power cemented under the banner of independence in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in defense over the last several decades, this is as foolish an act as working hard to sweep the sea with a broom.
					
					 As far as "solution to the nuclear issue of the north" is concerned, it is necessary to root out the fundamental factor that compelled the DPRK to access to nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lambastes Japan for Trying to Fabricate "Resolution on Human Rights" against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lambastes Japan for Trying to Fabricate "Resolution on Human Rights" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Japan is now busy with diplomacy for bringing together with EU the DPRK's non-existent "human rights issue" to the UN in a bid to fabricate a "resolution on human rights" against the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan is becoming a target of derision in the world as it is going foolish in its moves to conceal its past crimes while persisting in its bid to bring the DPRK's "human rights issue" to the UN and internationalize it.
					
					 Japan is behaving as if it were "a human rights champion" though it has not yet properly washed its hands and face stained with the blood shed by the Korean people and other Asian people. This is just like an act of provoking a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 Japan's behavior reveals its cynical ploy to keep buried into oblivion forever the sexual slavery, the monstrous crime against humanity whose liquidation it has shunned for more than seven decades.
					
					 No matter what charades and rhetoric Japan may employ to justify and defend its horrible crimes, it cannot sweep under carpet the shuddering acts of alluring and kidnapping 200 000 Korean women and ruthlessly killing many of them.
					
					 What Japan is doing at present only discloses its crafty intention to make world attention focused on the DPRK and to conceal its unspeakable human rights abuses.
					
					 All its sorts of base and despicable artifices to cover up its past crimes at any cost are futile.
					
					 It should face up to the trend of the times, honestly reflect on its crimes and stop at once its disgusting behavior.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Hold Confab to Boost Nuclear War Cooperation
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Hold Confab to Boost Nuclear War Cooperation
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The chairmen of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff reportedly held the 41st meeting of the south Korea-U.S. military committee at the U.S. Defence Department on Oct. 13.
					 The meeting was a master and servant confab for a war against the north which has been under way since 1978 under the pretext of working out the U.S. "defence strategy" and operational guidelines for south Korea and discussing pending issues concerning military alliance.
					
					 The meeting also attended by the U.S. Pacific commander and the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea examined the  military cooperation system based on the U.S. extended deterrence in case of emergency on the Korean peninsula and agreed to invent and introduce effective countermeasures to this end.
					
					 The recent confab was a criminal one aimed at reconfirming the preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK as the top priority task of the U.S.-south Korea military alliance and at rounding off the procedures for coordinated operations of the U.S. forces in south Korea, the U.S. Pacific Command and the south Korean puppet army.

articles.title: U.S. Forces Practice Usury
articles.content:
U.S. Forces Practice Usury 
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea continuously practice usuries with the expenses for the forces' upkeep collected from the south Korean people, sparking off a big uproar.
					 According to the south Korean internet paper E-Daily on October 13, much fund amounting to the one third of the military construction cost which is nearly half of the expenses for the upkeep were left unused in 2013 when Park Geun Hye took office.
					
					 The U.S. forces fail to use more than 10 percent of the military construction cost in 2014 and 2015.
					
					 The U.S. forces practice usuries with the money.

articles.title: Parliamentary Spokesman for Minju Party of S. Korea Demands Those Suspected of Scandal Appear before People
articles.content:
Parliamentary Spokesman for Minju Party of S. Korea Demands Those Suspected of Scandal Appear before People
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A parliamentary spokesman for the Minju Party of south Korea at a press conference on October 16 demanded the chief secretary for civil administration and the chief secretary for policy control of Chongwadae appear before the people as they touch off bitter resentment of the people by committing corruptions by abuse of power, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 He said anybody is obliged to clarify and ask for the understanding of the people for suspicious involvement in scandals.
					
					 Those who are suspected of scandals hide behind the wall of Chongwadae and the "president's" screen but this will not solve the problem, he said, adding:
					
					 The chief executive should not be careless to the daily falling support rate for her. The power which does not recognize the people is sure to be forsaken by them.

articles.title: S. Korean Minju Party Opposes Authorities' Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Minju Party Opposes Authorities' Suppression
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Minju Party of south Korea strongly opposes the suppression racket by the puppet authorities.
					 On October 12 the puppet prosecution authorities indicted the representative of the Minju Party and prominent lawmakers and many other members of the party on the charge of violation of the "election law" during the past April 13 general election.
					
					 Meanwhile, the prosecution took pro-Park Geun Hye persons of the "Saenuri Party" free from suspicions.
					
					 The Minju Party on October 13 held an emergency meeting of the supreme committee and a meeting of lawmakers at the "National Assembly" to bitterly denounce the Park Geun Hye regime and puppet prosecution. 
					
					 The representative of the Minju Party said the unprecedented indictment by the prosecution is the despicable one to cover up scandals of the authorities related to Choe Sun Sil, U Pyong U and others and suppression of the opposition party.
					
					 The Minju Party will not remain an onlooker to the "government's" bid to cover up scandals but struggle against them, the representative noted.

articles.title: Confrontation Maniac Takes Arbitrary Practices
articles.content:
Confrontation Maniac Takes Arbitrary Practices
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, spent at random the money collected from the people as taxes during his foreign tour for inciting anti-DPRK confrontation.
					 According to a lawmaker from an opposition party of south Korea on October 14, Hong with his stooges used twice VIPs rooms at an airport during his German visit in October last year. It costed 3 505,659 won in the south Korean currency.

articles.title: Probe into Suspicions about Power-backed Scandals Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Suspicions about Power-backed Scandals Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Public and lawmakers of opposition parties in south Korea are demanding a probe into the suspicions about power-backed sandals which are being disclosed, sparking off a public uproar, according to reports.
					 The Council of Professors of Ehwa Woman's University on Oct. 12 sent its president a notice demanding the probe into the suspicion that Jong Yu Ra who is a daughter of Choe Sun Sil, the closest confidant of Park Geun Hye, has been granted by the university all privileges for her admittance to the university and during her university days.
					
					 The General Students Council of the university held a press conference outside the main gate of the university on Oct. 17 denouncing Jong Yu Ra's fraudulent admittance and privilege granted to her. It demanded the university authorities make an apology and dismiss the university president.
					
					 The Professors Emergency Committee of the university decided to hold a rally at its main building demanding the resignation of its president.
					
					 Lawmakers from the opposition parties raised a suspicion about provision of privilege to Jong Yu Ra.
					
					 Meanwhile, a suspicion about privilege granted to Cha Un Thaek, one of key figures of Park Geun Hye, when appointing the head of the civilian-government joint group for promoting creative economy was exposed, sparking off a big public uproar.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Plot for Suppression of Art Circle Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Plot for Suppression of Art Circle Disclosed
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A south Korean artiste on October 14 disclosed the despicable plot of the puppet authorities to suppress art circle, according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 He said an impresario suffered sanctions from the "government" last year for the reason that he created a drama satirizing Park Chung-Hee two years ago. 
					
					 The "government" disregards the people who don't support it but voted for the opposition parties, he said, adding:
					
					 Artistes will resist the dictatorship specter of the 20th century revived in the 21st century.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group of Traitors' Desperate Efforts to Ignite War against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group of Traitors' Desperate Efforts to Ignite War against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities and the "Saenuri Party" on Oct. 18 decided to round off the puppet army's "triad strike system" for mounting a preemptive attack upon the DPRK early in the 2020s, according to the south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 Warmongers at the "consultative meeting for bolstering up the defence capability" held at the "National Assembly"  on the same day let out provocative outbursts calling for reinforcing the "triad strike system" composed of Kill Chain, missile defense system and "large-scale retaliatory operation strategy" to cope with the "nuclear threat" from the north.

articles.title: Leaflets Praising DPRK Scattered in Seoul City
articles.content:
Leaflets Praising DPRK Scattered in Seoul City
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leaflets praising the DPRK were scattered in Seoul city to the great excitement of the citizens on October 18, according to the KBS of south Korea.
					 Leaflets were found one after another in Changsin-dong and Myongryun-dong areas of Seoul whose total number reached 800.
					
					 Much upset by the voices growing strong among south Koreans from all walks of life desiring national reunification against the Park Geun Hye group's policy of confrontation with the DPRK, the puppet police are keen on looking into who scattered the leaflets.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime's Humiliating Acts Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime's Humiliating Acts Protested
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea protested against the humiliating acts of the puppet group insulting the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the Voice of Seoul, south Korean internet newspaper, on Oct. 14.
					 The "Reconciliation and Recovery Foundation" formed as part of the implementation of the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery held a consultative meeting that day and decided to pay 1 billion yen granted by Japan to victims of the sexual slavery against their will.
					
					 Enraged by this, the council made public a statement declaring that the action means retreat of justice and history.
					
					 The statement deplored the Park Geun Hye regime keeping the promise made with Japan, bound to the verbal "agreement".
					
					 It said that the rights of victims subject to serious human rights abuses can never be violated by the humiliating "agreement", adding that all the victims and bereaved families have the right to demand the proper settlement of the issue and get reparation.
					
					 Articles denouncing the puppet group for pressing for the implementation of the shackling "agreement" are posted on websites in succession.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Romanian Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Romanian Party
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted by the New Socialist Party of Romania on internet website Juche Idea on the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the road of developing the party into his party for eternity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th WPK Congress Published in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th WPK Congress Published in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Kuwait Times published in booklet supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee with due ceremony on October 9.
					 The report, made by him on May 6 and 7, Juche 105 (2016), comprehensively deals with the proud achievements and valuable experience made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways to hold fast to the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the WPK, accomplish the cause of socialism, achieve the independent reunification of the country and global independence and steadily strengthen the WPK.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania, Sweden, Spain, Sri Lanka, Indonesia and DR Congo from October 5 to 9 on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display in the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania said the WPK is demonstrating its might as an invincible revolutionary party thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said after Kim Il Sung founded the WPK, the DPRK could further powerfully promote the building of an independent and sovereign state. All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are firmly protecting socialism true to the leadership of the Party, he added.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain said the WPK, which has led the unprecedentedly arduous Korean revolution to victory for over 70 years, is the beacon of hope for the progressives.
					
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies said the Korean people will surely build a socialist power as they are led by Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Sweden.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed by Indian Newspapers
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed by Indian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Indian newspapers carried special write-ups to mark the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Indian and World Event on Oct. 8 dedicated two full pages to articles illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 An article said that the WPK is the party of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. It went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, was a prominent leader who made sure that the WPK demonstrated its might as a guiding force of the Korean society and prestigious one steering the cause of human independence.
					
					 He built the WPK into a mass party that achieved a harmonious whole with the popular masses, deeply rooted among them.
					
					 His cause of building the party was successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il is the eternal leader of the WPK who turned it into the party of Comrade Kim Il Sung and militant staff of the Songun revolution.
					
					 It is the unanimous will and unshakable faith of the Korean people to glorify the WPK as the party of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages.
					
					 New Delhi Times on Oct. 5 in an article gave a detailed account of the exploits Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed for building a space power.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la Conferencia de Cruz Roja de la RPDC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la Conferencia de Cruz Roja de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 18 y 19 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la Conferencia de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El conclave hizo balance del cumplimiento de las metas del plan estrategico hasta 2016 despues de la Conferencia de 2012 y los programas anuales de actividades y discutio los problemas que se presentan en ampliar y desarrollar aun mas las actividades humanitarias de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja. 
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, los miembros del Comite Central de la ACR, los funcionarios de la Cruz Roja en la capital y las localidades, los voluntarios y los miembros de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de Jovenes y Ninos. 
					
					Fueron invitados los delegados del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja, la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y las asociaciones de cruz roja de Dinamarca, Finlandia y Gran Bretana, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en la RPDC y los miembros de las delegaciones del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja y la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja que trabajan en la RPDC. 
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso de felicitacion, Yang Hyong Sop recordo que bajo la orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, la ACR viene cumpliendo perfectamente su mision y papel. 
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, se alcanzara mayor avance en las nobles actividades humanitarias de la ACR. Y deseo los exitos de la conferencia.
					
					El delegado del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja, Boris Michel, y el de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, Christopher Staines, dijeron en sus discursos que en el tiempo pasado, la ACR de la RPDC ha cumplido con responsabilidad las labores para realizar los principios fundamentales de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, y expresaron la voluntad de intensificar las actividades de cooperacion internacional. 
					
					Hubo informe en la conferencia. 
					
					El informador menciono que en el periodo de examen, la ACR ha desempenado satisfactoriamente el papel directivo para que todos los funcionarios y voluntarios de la Cruz Roja cumplieran con su responsabilidad y deber conforme a las circunstancias y condiciones cambiadas y a la demanda de los que necesitan la ayuda de Cruz Roja. 
					
					Insistio en mantener y glorificar generacion tras generacion las proezas de los grandes Lideres y desarrollar la ACR como entidad humanitaria.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo intervenciones. 
					
					El conclave hizo balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto de la ACR de la RPDC durante el periodo de examen. 
					
					Discutio el plan estrategico y el presupuesto hasta el ano 2020 y eligio a los miembros del nuevo organo de direccion.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por aniversario 70 de fundacion de ACR de RPDC
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por aniversario 70 de fundacion de ACR de RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en la Casa Cultural Chollima un acto dedicado al 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja (ACR) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el presidente Kang Ji Yong y otros miembros del Comite Central de la ACR, los funcionarios de la cruz roja del centro y las localidades, los voluntarios, los integrantes de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de Jovenes y Ninos (ACRJN) y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  Fueron invitados los delegados del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja, la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, y las asociaciones de la Cruz Roja de Dinamarca, Finlandia y Gran Bretana, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en la RPDC, y los miembros de las delegaciones de las dos entidades internacionales arriba mencionadas, que trabajan en la RPDC.
					
					  El secretario general del CC de la ACR, Ri Ho Rim, dijo en su discurso que en el pasado, la ACR vino cumpliendo magnificamente su mision y deber al desarrollar las labores de salud publica e higiene y ayuda, las actividades de socorro y profilaxis en el tiempo de guerra, la repatriacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon, el apoyo humanitario a varios paises del mundo, los trabajos para aliviar desgracias y sufrimientos de los coreanos causados por la division territorial del pais, la prevencion de calamidades naturales, la reaccion urgente en el tiempo de desastre, la restauracion y desarrollo y la profilaxis de enfermedades.
					
					  Subrayo que en el futuro tambien, la ACR hara aporte peculiar a defender, mantener y glorificar las hazanas inmortales de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y a la lucha pannacional por la reunificacion independiente de la patria.
					
					  En la ocasion se presentaron a los funcionarios, voluntarios y miembros de la ACRJN quienes sobresalieron en las labores de cruz roja.
					
					  Los participantes pasaron revista a las fotos y los libros que hacen recordar la historia y las actividades de la ACR y vieron el video "Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, 1946-2016".
					
					  Ademas se ofrecio una funcion artistica de los miembros de la ACRJN y los alumnos de la Escuela de Ciegos de Taedong, dedicada al 70o aniversario de fundacion de la ACR.
					
					  El mismo dia, el CC de la ACR de la RPDC ofrecio un banquete por la misma efemeride.

articles.title: Asociacion de Cruz Roja de la RPDC alcanza metas perspectivas
articles.content:
Asociacion de Cruz Roja de la RPDC alcanza metas perspectivas
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de Cruz Roja de la RPDC alcanzo las metas perspectivas para el cumplimiento del plan estrategico para el periodo hasta el ano 2016.
					Asi dijo a la ACNC, el presidente del Comite Central de la ACR, Ri Chung Bok, y prosiguio:
					
					En la conferencia de la cruz roja de la RPDC, celebrada en 2012, fue evaluado y aprobado el plan estrategico a ser cumplido hasta el ano 2016 por la ACR de acuerdo con las condiciones reales en cambio y la estrategia de 2020 de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja.
					
					Los funcionarios de la asociacion y de las sucursales de todos los niveles y los voluntarios de todo el pais vinieron realizando ingentes esfuerzos por alcanzar las metas perspectivas.
					
					Prestando especial atencion a la prevencion de desastres y al mejoramiento de la capacidad de reaccion urgente, nuestra asociacion protegio la vida y bienes de la gente desde las calamidades y crisis de toda indole e intensifico la capacidad recuperativa.
					
					Ha realizado en ambito nacional la divulgacion de conocimientos sobre los primeros auxilios, la propaganda sanitaria y la educacion a fin de prevenir diversas enfermedades.
					
					Ademas, ha mejorado el ambiente ecologico y la higiene ambiental para que los habitantes llevaran una vida sana y segura.
					
					Al instalar nuevas redes de alcantarillado en miles de viviendas, logro reducir en zonas pobladas la tasa de brote de enfermedades causadas por la contaminacion de agua, de modo que los pobladores pudieran vivir con mayor comodidad y civilizacion. 
					
					Obtuvo muchos exitos en mejorar las condiciones de vida de los ninos, mujeres, ancianos sin tutela y los discapacitados que deben ser atendidos por la sociedad y en intensificar las actividades de cruz roja de los jovenes y ninos.
					
					En estrecha cooperacion con los medios de comunicacion masiva y las entidades sociales, logro elevar notablemente la atencion social a las actividades de cruz roja.
					
					Igualmente, se intensificaron y se desarrollaron el intercambio y la cooperacion entre nuestra asociacion con la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, el Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja y varias entidades hermanas.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la reunion del cuarto comite de 71a sesion de Asamblea General de la ONU
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la reunion del cuarto comite de 71a sesion de Asamblea General de la ONU 
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 11 y 13 en la sede de la ONU la reunion del cuarto comite (Politica especial y Descolonizacion) de la 71a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					En la ocasion hubo debates del tema "Cooperacion internacional en el uso del cosmos con fines pacificos". 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el delegado coreano insistio en que el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC con fines pacificos y de caracter legitimo es el ejercicio del derecho independiente de un Estado soberano, reconocido en 100 % por la Carta de la ONU y el Tratado Espacial. 
					
					Enfatizo que en el futuro tambien, la RPDC acelerara el desarrollo aeroespacial con fines pacificos y fomentara la cooperacion e intercambio internacionales en los estudios de ciencia espacial y en el lanzamiento de satelites artificiales. 
					
					Terminado el discurso del delegado coreano, solo la delegacion titere surcoreana se atrevio a refutarlo chismeando que el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC es la "prueba de cohete balistico para cargar ojiva nuclear" y "viola la 'resolucion' del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU" y que "exhorta que no hagan la cooperacion tecnica con el Norte de Corea". 
					
					Al usar de inmediato la palabra de respuesta, el delegado de la RPDC condeno fuertemente que la misma "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU resulta una flagrante violacion de los derechos legitimos de un Estado soberano estipulados en la Carta de la ONU y el derecho internacional y un producto de la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					Tras revelar el caracter ilegal de las tentativas de EE.UU. y sus satelites de suprimir el legitimo derecho independiente de un Estado soberano, reitero la voluntad intransigente de la RPDC de seguir demostrando su digno y gallardo aspecto de potencia espacial sin hacer caso de lo que digan otros. 
					
					Durante la reunion, los delegados de Iran, Ecuador y otros paises en vias de desarrollo insistieron en que debe ser respetado el derecho inalienable de todos los paises al uso y desarrollo del cosmos con fines pacificos. 
					
					Exhortaron a intensificar la cooperacion internacional apuntando que el objetivo del uso pacifico del cosmos es dar beneficios a todos los paises mediante el desarrollo aeroespacial.

articles.title: Delegado coreano pronuncia discurso en la reunion del tercer comite de la ONU
articles.content:
Delegado coreano pronuncia discurso en la reunion del tercer comite de la ONU 
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- El delegado coreano hizo uso de la palabra durante el debate de la agenda "Progreso de la mujer" en la reunion del tercer comite de la 71a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU, celebrada el pasado dia 11. 
					El dijo que en el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se esforzara ingentemente por el progreso y el bienestar de la mujer e intensificara la cooperacion y el intercambio internacionales, y continuo:
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, exhortamos a la sociedad internacional que preste la atencion debida al intento de Japon de ocultar el crimen de esclavitud sexual cometido por el viejo ejercito japones en el pasado. 
					
					En cuanto a este crimen de lesa humanidad, en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Japon violo los derechos humanos de 200 mil mujeres coreanas y las otras incontables de varios paises de Asia y el resto del mundo convirtiendolas en esclavas sexuales para sus uniformados. 
					
					Sin embargo, Japon niega todavia ese crimen e intenta ocultarlo con astucia, en lugar de pedir perdon. 
					
					Japon no puede liberarse nunca de la responsabilidad legal y estatal por la esclavitud sexual. Debe reconocerla, pedir perdon e indemnizar sus crimenes del pasado como lo demanda la sociedad internacional. 
					
					En particular, opinamos que la ONU debe cuestionar el acto terrorista de las autoridades surcoreanas que secuestraron en masas a plena luz del dia a las ciudadanas de la RPDC y no escucharon la elemental demanda humanitaria de dar a conocer la situacion personal de ellas y devolverlas a la patria. 
					
					La manera de manejar tales problemas es la pauta para determinar la veracidad o la hipocresia de la "proteccion y fomento de derechos humanos" que preconizan la ONU y las organizaciones internacionales de DDHH. 
					
					Por lo tanto, demandamos fuertemente que la ONU trate oficialmente ese crimen de las autoridades surcoreanas y tome las medidas para la devolucion inmediata de nuestras ciudadanas al regazo de sus familiares.

articles.title: CRN publica acta de interpelacion abierta enviada a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRN publica acta de interpelacion abierta enviada a Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que ultimamente, la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye esta dando sintomas de su incontrolable fiebre conflictiva con la RPDC, el Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica hoy un acta de interpelacion abierta enviada a ella.
					El documento senala que sumandose activamente a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de su amo norteamericano, Park dice palabras belicosas tales como el "ataque preventivo" y hasta instiga la "fuga del Norte" con embustes como "indicio de derrumbe" y "autodestruccion".
					
					La histerica campana conflictiva de la traidora no pasa de ser el retorcimiento desesperado de ella que presintio su arruinamiento definitivo en el fortalecimiento vertiginoso del poderio estatal de la RPDC y en la seria crisis de gobernacion en que han caido, ironiza el acta y formula las siguientes preguntas:
					
					1. ?No le ha llegado a la traidora el tiempo de declarar publicamente que el "proceso de confianza", el "cajon de tesoros para la unificacion" y otras cosas anunciadas hasta ahora son una farsa para realizar su ilusion de la "unificacion mediante la absorcion" persiguiendo a EE.UU.?
					
					Si bien se ha revelado su naturaleza conflictiva, ?seguira ella portandose descaradamente ocultando que las palabras referidas fueron una farsa barata para disimular su siniestra intencion sobre la "unificacion mediante la absorcion"?
					
					2. Ella esta hablando abiertamente del "ataque preventivo" depositando la confianza en EE.UU. ?No le importa que se reduzcan a cenizas no solo Seul, donde se halla Chongwadae, sino toda la extension geografica surcoreana por el inmediato y despiadado contraataque de la RPDC?
					
					?Piensa acaso que podra salvarse en la guerra nuclear cuyo resultado se decide en el acto?
					
					3. ?No sabe acaso que la abierta agitacion de la "fuga del Norte" es el brutal acto de rapto y secuestro y el crimen antietico que desafian a las leyes internacionales y a la Carta de la ONU?
					
					La abierta agitacion de "sumision" sobre los habitantes de un Estado soberano deviene un desafio frontal y flagrante violacion de la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales que estipulan como principios fundamentales el respeto a la soberania de todos los paises y la no intervencion en asuntos internos y como brutal crimen antietico los actos de secuestro.
					
					Park Geun-hye esta acostumbrada a acusar a otros hablando a menudo de la "observacion de la Carta de la ONU" y las "leyes internacionales". Entonces, ?cometera ella sin vacilacion alguna los escalofriantes crimenes inhumanitarios y antieticos sin conocer tales cosas elementales? 
					
					4. ?Puede asumir ante la historia y la nacion la responsabilidad de haber inculcado la hostilidad a la parte connacional durante su mandato tergiversando y difamando con mentiras, fraudes e inventos el verdadero aspecto de la RPDC y sus sinceros esfuerzos por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas?
					
					El gobernador, habituado a mentir e inventar, pierde sin falta la popularidad y sera condenado a la severa sentencia de la historia.
					
					5. Ella trata de tapar la vista y oidos de la poblacion surcoreana negando obstinadamente la realidad brillante de la RPDC. Entonces, ?sera capaz de venir a nuestro pais para confirmar los hechos con ojos propios, ya que le dejaremos abiertos todos los caminos?
					
					A Park le convendria venir a la RPDC para aclarar las sospechas de la poblacion surcoreana sobre la demagogia de ella, tales como el "estado emergente", la "inestabilidad del regimen" y los "efectos de sancion".
					
					Si no puede hacerlo por el miedo al castigo correspondiente a sus crimenes anti-RPDC, que mande a todas las personas que quieran visitar a la RPDC.
					
					6. ?Tiene la osadia de recibir la severa sentencia en el tribunal de la RPDC reconociendo sus inauditos crimenes de ofender la dignidad y el orgullo de nuestros militares y habitantes e insultar la vida feliz de ellos?
					
					Hace mucho tiempo, segun el codigo penal de la RPDC, nuestro supremo organo judicial sentencio a la pena capital a Park al calificarla de criminal de pesima calana.
					
					Puesto que ella fue tan atrevida en insultar el simbolo de toda la dignidad y gloria de la RPDC, deberia ser "resuelta" tambien en pagar sus actos criminales.
					
					?Tendria acaso Park Geun-hye el coraje de hacerlo?
